title: LeetCode Problem List
description: A collection of LeetCode problems with their solutions and explanations.

problems.title: Two Sum
problems.description: Find two numbers in an array that add up to a specific target.

problems.title: Add Two Numbers
problems.description: Add two numbers represented by linked lists.

problems.title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
problems.description: Find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.

problems.title: Median of Two Sorted Arrays
problems.description: Find the median of two sorted arrays.

problems.title: Longest Palindromic Substring
problems.description: Find the longest palindromic substring in a string.

problems.title: Container With Most Water
problems.description: Find the maximum area of water that can be contained between two lines.

problems.title: 3Sum
problems.description: Find all unique triplets in an array that sum up to zero.

problems.title: Letter Combinations of a Phone Number
problems.description: Return all possible letter combinations that the number could represent.
